ModelFit object, output from sampling

Source: R/modelfit-class.R
ModelFit.Rd

ModelFit object, output from sampling

ModelFit object, output from sampling

Public fields

rawdata

The original data that was used to prepare the model

prior

The Prior that was used to fit the model

stanfit

rstan::stanfit output

model

Model object used to generate the fit

Method new()

Create a new ModelFit

Usage

ModelFit$new(rawdata, prior, model, stanfit)

Arguments

rawdata

dataframe from which to make standata

prior

Prior that was used to fit the model

model

Model used to draw samples

stanfit

rstan::stanfit output by model

Returns

A new ModelFit object.

Method standata()

Usage

ModelFit$standata()

Returns

A named list Estimate the LOO score

Arguments

cores

int

Returns

A loo::psis_loo object create voxel tuning function posterior

Method make_vtf0()

Usage

ModelFit$make_vtf0(cores = 1)

Arguments

cores

integer number of cores over which to parallelize

Returns

array n_draws x n_chains x n_unique obs. for use in ModelFit$loo() Likelihood function

Method clone()
